column4: Hi all. Have UNR 9.4 running on an eee pc 901. Was hoping to upgrade to 9.10. The docs say that to upgrade over the internet you can just use the update manager. My system is currently up to date but when I check for available updates the option to download the new distribution isn't presented.
Anyone come across this issue before?
u need to change the settings of the uplad manager
I thought that too and changed the settings a few times but still no luck. Maybe I missed something in there...
